# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="efed0-102">E-mail és az Outlook.com naptárak nyomtatása</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efed0-103">E-mail üzenet nyomtatásakor:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="efed0-104">Válassza ki a nyomtatni kívánt üzenetet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="efed0-105">Az üzenet jobb felső sarkában, jelölje ki a három pont</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="efed0-106">Válassza ki, és</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="efed0-107">**Nyomtatás**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efed0-108">A naptár nyomtatása:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="efed0-109">Válassza ki az oldal jobb felső sarkában</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="efed0-110">**Nyomtatás**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="efed0-111">Válassza a nézet- és időtartományát, és jelölje ki a **Nyomtatás**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efed0-112">További [nyomtatási e-mail](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)és a naptárak az Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efed0-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
